com.defano.jmonet.tools

Class FillTool

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.defano.jmonet.tools.base.PaintTool
      • com.defano.jmonet.tools.FillTool
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CanvasCommitObserver, SurfaceInteractionObserver, KeyListener, EventListener

    public class FillTool
extends PaintTool
    Tool that performs a flood-fill of all transparent pixels.
